attributes.title: Germany Sinks the RMS Lusitania - Ship Hits the Fan Podcast
attributes.caption: A torpedoed ocean liner drags the US into the first World War.
attributes.description:
May 7th, 1915 a German U-Boat torpedoed a British ocean liner, killing almost 1200 passengers and crew. As the ship sank, tensions rose, and set the stage for the US to enter the first World War.

attributes.title: The Andrea Doria and The Stockholm Collide - Ship Hits the Fan Podcast
attributes.caption: Two ships collide then work together for a successful rescue operation.
attributes.description:

attributes.title: Cannibalism and Survival on The Mignonette - Ship Hits the Fan Podcast
attributes.caption: The choice of sacrificing one to save so many others.
attributes.description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/shiphitsfan16 and use code shiphitsfan16 for 16 free meals plus free shipping!

Go to http://rtxaustin.com to buy your badge!



Adrift in a lifeboat for over 20 days, the crew of the Mignonette were hungry and dying, until they made one of the hardest choices of all. The choice to sacrifice one to save the others.

attributes.title: It Has Been a Privilege: The Titanic Part 2 - Ship Hits the Fan Podcast
attributes.caption: Why it continues to haunt, shock, and amaze.
attributes.description:
Go to http://lectricebikes.com to give the gift of adventure for Father’s Day!



Today we continue the tale of the RMS Titanic. When we left off, the ill fated ship was approaching Newfoundland on her (so far) uneventful voyage. What happened next has reverberated throughout history and continues to haunt, shock, and amaze
